channel.title: Brand new to rsps need help got source client set up
channel.description:
ok like the subject says im brand new i downloaded bonescape source wich is a 508 since i want atleast thos graphix.im not a leecher if i use some1 elses codes il credit them not that im planing on hostiong or giving this source away i just want the basics like skills,godswords claws with spec music sound skill capes npc's and the basics i want basicly an older runescape and no customes.when i get that then im looking to add the old tut island i started with.my goal is to learn and be able to host a better source once i know the basics.
any1 willing to help me learn pm me or post.
plzzz no flaming/spaming
ty for the time reading this :D
